title: Federal Reserve Cuts Rates 25 Basis Points But Signals Fewer Cuts in 2025 – Markets Tumble
shortdescription: Fed delivers final 2024 rate cut but projects only two cuts in 2025, down from four – inflation concerns persist.
description: Fed cuts rates to 4.25-4.50% but hawkish outlook sends S&P 500 down 3% – sticky inflation complicates 2025 policy.
author: Macro Anton

title: Denmark Pushes Back on U.S. Greenland Acquisition Plans in Recent Talks
shortdescription: Trump pushes for Greenland's control to strengthen U.S. national security, sparking a diplomatic conflict with Denmark and Greenland amid international opposition.
description: Denmark Foreign Minister Lars Løkke Rasmussen characterized the exchange as frank, stating, “There’s clearly a disagreement.
author: Macro Anton

title: TMC MP’s Arrested During Protests Against ED’s I-PAC Raids
shortdescription: TMC leaders, including MPs Mahua Moitra and Derek O’Brien, were arrested by Delhi police during a protest against ED raids on the I-PAC office in Kolkata.
description: Mamata Banerjee accuses the government of using the agency for political targeting ahead of West Bengal elections.
author: Macro Anton

title: Ilhan Omar Attacked with Unknown Substance at Minnesota Town Hall, Suspect Arrested
shortdescription: Ilhan Omar was sprayed with an unidentified substance during a Minneapolis town hall. Police arrested a suspect as concerns over political violence grow.
description: City forensic scientists were dispatched to investigate the situation. Kazmierczak has a history of posting political content on social media.
author: Macro Anton
